entry.title: Drivechain proposal using OP_COUNT_ACKS
entry.summary: The email thread is a technical discussion and not political. Peter Todd suggests that Rootstock should adopt a legally binding patent pledge or license, such as the Defensive Patent License (DPL), to rectify any potential patent issues. He mentions that he will be doing so for his own consulting company. If Rootstock does not plan on obtaining offensive patents, then there should be no issue with adopting the DPL. Todd requests that this issue be fixed so that collaboration can continue to improve Bitcoin.
